workflow.name: Generate AI sales proposals from transcripts using Azure OpenAI, PandaDoc & Slack approval
workflow.description:
## AI Proposal Workflow Overview

This workflow turns your **sales calls + intake form** into a polished, send-ready proposal.  
It pulls the latest call transcript from **Fireflies**, generates structured proposal content with **Azure OpenAI**, builds a proposal in **PandaDoc**, routes it for **Slack approval**, and then handles sending, CRM stage updates (Airtable/HubSpot), and automated follow-ups using the PandaDoc audit trail.

This workflow is modular. You can replace each major tool:
- **Fireflies** → Gong, Fathom, Wingman, Avoma (any transcript provider)  
- **PandaDoc** → DocuSign, Qwilr, Proposify, Google Docs API  
- **Slack Approval** → Gmail Approval, MS Teams Approval, Notion DB Approvals  
- **Airtable CRM** → HubSpot, Pipedrive, Salesforce, Zoho, Monday Sales CRM  
- **Intake Form** → Typeform, Tally, Jotform, HubSpot forms  
- **Azure OpenAI** → OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Mistral, or any LLM connected through an API  

The core logic stays the same — you only swap the nodes.

---

## Who It’s For
- Agencies & consultants who send similar proposals after every call  
- B2B SaaS / tech teams that want proposals going out within hours  
- Solo operators who want AI to handle most of the draft but keep final control  
- Teams already working out of **Slack**, wanting approval flows there  

---

## How It Works

### 1. Form Trigger (Client Proposal Intake)
Client fills a form with:
- Name, email, website  
- Industry / business context  
- Problem, solution idea, scope  
- Budget, timeline, deliverables  

### 2. Sales Call Intelligence (Fireflies or Gong)
- Workflow searches transcripts using the client email  
- Fetches the relevant transcript + summary  

### 3. AI Proposal Generator (Azure OpenAI or any LLM)
- Sets initial variables (`draftText`, `lastFeedback`)  
- Sends transcript + form data into LLM  
- Returns structured JSON:
  - introduction  
  - client_problem  
  - proposed_solution  
  - scope_of_work 
  - deliverables 
  - timeline_breakdown 
  - investment  
  - next_steps  

### 4. Proposal Creation (PandaDoc, DocuSign, etc.)
- Creates the proposal document from a template  
- Fills tokens with AI-generated content  
- Inserts pricing table using Budget  

### 5. Slack Approval Loop
- Slack message is sent to reviewer with:
  - **Approve** button  
  - **Request Changes** button  
  - Optional comment thread for feedback  
- If **Approved**:
  - Proposal is sent automatically via PandaDoc/DocuSign 
  - Slack message to notify proposal has been sent
- If **Changes Requested**:
  - Feedback + draft are stored  
  - Passed back into the LLM to regenerate  
  - New document is created and the Slack approval request is sent again  
- This loop continues until approval happens  

### 6. CRM Update (Airtable / HubSpot)
- After proposal is sent, Stage → **Proposal Sent**  

### 7. Follow-Up System (PandaDoc Audit Trail)
After a 48-hour wait:
- Audit trail is fetched  
- If document is **not yet signed**:
  - Reminder is sent  
  - Stage → **Reminder Sent**  
  - Slack message to notify a reminder has been sent
- If **signed**:
  - Stage → **Document Signed**  
---

### Ideal use cases
- Sales teams creating tailored proposals at scale  
- Agencies responding quickly to inbound RFPs  
- Freelancers producing polished proposals in minutes  
- RevOps teams standardizing proposal formats  
- SaaS companies automating repetitive proposal creation

---

## Requirements
- n8n (self-hosted or cloud)  
- Transcript provider (Fireflies, Gong, Fathom, etc.)  
- LLM API (Azure OpenAI, OpenAI, Claude, etc.)  
- Proposal tool (PandaDoc, DocuSign, Qwilr)  
- Slack API app for approval flow  
- CRM (Airtable, HubSpot, Pipedrive)  
- Intake form  

---

You can now integrate this into your lead workflow and let AI + automation handle proposal drafting, Slack approvals, sending, CRM updates, and follow-ups.

messageValues.message:
=Your task is to generate structured proposal content for a B2B automation project. You also have summary from Client Sales call for more context.

Please break scope, deliverables, and timeline into structured parts. It will be 4 parts for scope and deliverables and 3 for timeline. You will sometimes also receive previous draft text and reviewer feedback. Improve the draft accordingly while keeping structure consistent.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "introduction": "Hi Sarah...",
  "client_problem": "You shared that your team is struggling with...",
  "proposed_solution": "Automation Jinn will implement...",
  "scope_of_work": [
    "Set up unified CRM automations",
    "Integrate payment → onboarding workflow",
    "Create reporting dashboards"
  ],
  "deliverables": [
    "Workflow automation setup",
    "Dashboard buildout",
    "Team training session"
  ],
  "timeline_breakdown": [
    "Week 1: Discovery & process mapping",
    "Week 2–3: Build & integration",
    "Week 4: QA testing & deployment"
  ],
  "investment": "$4,000 one-time automation project",
  "next_steps": "Please review and sign the proposal..."
}

parameters.content: ## Follow Up System using Audit Trail

## AI Proposal Workflow Overview( By Sparsh from Automation Jinn www.automationjinn.com)

Turn **sales calls + intake forms** into **send-ready proposals — fast and consistent**.

### What this workflow does
1️⃣ You submit the form to generate the prooposal → goals, budget, timeline  
2️⃣ Transcript is pulled from Fireflies 
3️⃣ LLM creates a **structured proposal draft** (problem → solution → scope → budget → timeline → next steps)  
4️⃣ PandaDoc generates the proposal from your template  
5️⃣ **Slack approval loop**  
   - Approve → send automatically  
   - Request changes → AI regenerates draft and loops back for approval( loops until perfect)
6️⃣ CRM updates stage to **Proposal Sent**  
7️⃣ Follow-up automation uses PandaDoc audit trail  
   - If not signed in 48h → reminder + CRM update  
   - If signed → CRM → **Closed Won**

### Who this is perfect for
- Agencies & consultants  
- Business creating proposals manualy
- B2B SaaS & tech service teams  
- Solo operators who want proposals out **within hours, not days**

### Why teams love it
- 100% reusable → swap Fireflies, PandaDoc, HubSpot, Slack, etc. without changing core logic  
- Faster turnaround = **more closed deals**  
- Zero manual follow-ups

**Outcome:** sales stays focused on selling — not writing proposals, chasing approvals, or nudging clients to sign.

nodes.name: Send a message and wait for response

parameters.message: =Check the Proposal generated by AI- https://app.pandadoc.com/a/#/documents/{{ $json.id }}

parameters.text: =Have send the reminder to the client as the document(https://app.pandadoc.com/a/#/documents/{{ $('Send Document').item.json.id }}) is not completed even after 48 hours.
=I have sent the proposal for Client-  {{ $json.recipients[0].first_name }} from {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Client Company Name'] }}

main.node: Send a message and wait for response

user.name: Sparsh From Automation Jinn
user.bio:
Founder @ Automation Jinn where we help businesses streamline sales processes, optimize CRMs, and unlock actionable insights from their data. 

We provide end-to-end solutions, ensuring each workflow is robust, scalable, and aligned with your strategic goals. 

If you need professional help with n8n, feel free to book a call with me through my link below.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
